title: reconnecting at login screen
body: i open league but it says trying to reconnect. i've checked my firewall and it is allowed and my internet is fine,

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, does this resolve your issue?
Was in champ select for a Ranked game  and suddenly disconnected, failing to connect at login screen also. No other internet issues present.
